CustomField.formula:
if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Unit_Type__c, "")),text(Unit_Type__c) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Number_of_bedrooms__c , "")),text(Number_of_bedrooms__c) & ", " ,null)& if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( MBD__c , "")),text(MBD__c) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Living_rm__c , "")),text(Living_rm__c) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Dining_rm__c , "")),text(Dining_rm__c ) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Hall__c, "")),text(Hall__c) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Liv_Din_rm__c , "")),text(Liv_Din_rm__c ) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Family_rm__c , "")),text(Family_rm__c ) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Office__c , "")),text(Office__c ) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Stairs__c , "")),text(Stairs__c ) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Rec_rm_Great_rm__c , "")),text(Rec_rm_Great_rm__c ) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Loft__c , "")),text(Loft__c) & ", " ,null) & if(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Walk_In_Closet__c , "")),text(Walk_In_Closet__c) & ", " ,null) &
IF(INCLUDES(Rugs__c, "3X5"), "3X5;", NULL) & IF(INCLUDES(Rugs__c, "5X7"), "5X7;", NULL) & IF(INCLUDES(Rugs__c, "8X10"), "8X10;", NULL) & IF(INCLUDES(Rugs__c, "9X12"), "9X12;", NULL) & if(NOT(ISBLANK(Other__c)), Other__c & ", " ,null)
CustomField.label: SFDC SCC Line Item Description
